questions.question: What is the speed range for a category C aeroplane?
What constitutes Low Vis Procedures?
options: Low Vis Take-off and Cat II/III approaches
Low Vis Take-off and precision approaches
questions.solution: Low Vis Take-off and Cat II/III approaches
